item.title: keptn
item.description:
Description

A Helm chart for Keptn, a set of tools to enable cloud-native application lifecycle management

  • https://github.com/keptn/lifecycle-toolkit

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
certificate-operator default âŒ â€” 8 1 Critical
lifecycle-operator default âŒ â€” 48 1 Critical
metrics-operator default âŒ â€” 15 1 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.
